Notation pos := Fin.t

Nat.max_spec_le : forall n m : nat, n <= m /\ Nat.max n m = m \/ m <= n /\ Nat.max n m = n
Nat.max_spec : forall n m : nat, n < m /\ Nat.max n m = m \/ m <= n /\ Nat.max n m = n
